title: Robin Wittkamp - Web developer and UI/UX designer
description: Hi, I'm Robin. I develop performant websites and web applications with focus on design and user experience.

heroSection.subheading: I've designed and developed websites and web apps for over four years as a freelancer. I studied visual computing and design at the Hamm-Lippstadt University of Applied Sciences.
heroSection.logosDescription: Trusted by businesses from all over Germany

aboutSection.heading: About me
aboutSection.paragraphOne: My interest in designing and implementing user interfaces started 6 years ago. As a result, I began my studies at the University of Applied Sciences Hamm-Lippstadt in Computer Visualization and Design. During my studies, I worked as a student assistant in various web and design projects.
aboutSection.paragraphTwo: In 2018, I additionally registered a business. Since then, I have been building websites and web applications for companies from Germany as a freelancer. For the implementation of projects I use both proven technologies like WordPress and more modern technologies like React.js or Next.js.
